acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
acrobatics.description: You can keep your balance while traversing narrow or treacherous surfaces, escape from restraints, and tumble to avoid attacks.

athletics.name: Athletics
athletics.description: You can scale vertical surfaces, leap over obstacles, and swim.

bluff.name: Bluff
bluff.description: You can use words and actions to misdirect your enemies' attention, allowing you to attempt tricks and feints in combat.

computers.name: Computers
computers.description: You can operate, manipulate, and hack into computer systems.

culture.name: Culture
culture.description: You are a student of the vast number of known cultures in the galaxy.

diplomacy.name: Diplomacy
diplomacy.description: You can persuade others to agree with your arguments, resolve differences, and gather valuable information or rumors from people.

disguise.name: Disguise
disguise.description: You are able to change your appearance to blend in and deceive others.

engineering.name: Engineering
engineering.description: You can identify, build, repair, or disable technological devices.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.description: You can rattle your foes or bully them to do what you want with verbal threats or displays of prowess.

life_science.name: Life Science
life_science.description: You are educated in the scientific study of living things, from the smallest organisms to the largest biological systems.

medicine.name: Medicine
medicine.description: You have knowledge of the biology of many species and can treat a number of different types of wounds and ailments.

mysticism.name: Mysticism
mysticism.description: You are educated in the fields of magic, religion, the planes, and spellcasting, and you can use this knowledge to cast spells or identify magical effects.

perception.name: Perception
perception.description: You can use all of your senses (hearing, taste, touch, sight, and smell) to notice danger, pick out details, and search for hidden objects or creatures.

physical_science.name: Physical Science
physical_science.description: You are educated in the scientific study of non-living systems, from the tiniest atoms to the largest celestial bodies.

piloting.name: Piloting
piloting.description: You know how to drive and pilot vehicles and starships.

profession.name: Profession
profession.description: You are skilled in a specific job, specialty, or creative art.

sense_motive.name: Sense Motive
sense_motive.description: You can detect falsehoods and gain glimpses of the true intentions of creatures with which you interact.

sleight_of_hand.name: Sleight of Hand
sleight_of_hand.description: You can hide small objects, perform feats of legerdemain, pick pockets, and perform other manual tricks.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: You can stay hidden and move silently to avoid detection, allowing you to sneak past foes or strike from an unseen position.

survival.name: Survival
survival.description: You can survive in and make your way safely through almost any kind of wilderness, follow trails and tracks, deal with wild animals, and ride tamed ones.
